span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 无经验的： deficient in training, knowledge, or experience
【例】 lead a squad[skwɑd]小队 of green recruits 带领一队没有经验的新兵
【近】 inexperienced, callow, fresh, raw, unfledged, young
【反】 experienced, versed 经验丰富的
